mapper.insert: INSERT INTO portfolio VALUES (#{uname},portfolio_SEQ.nextval,#{pfname}, to_date(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi'),#{pfthumb}, 0,#{pfurl},#{pffile},#{pfposition},#{tagname})
mapper.select: SELECT uname, pfnum, pfname, pfdate, pfthumb, pfread, pfurl, pffile, pfposition, tagname FROM portfolio
SELECT uname, pfnum, pfname, pfdate, pfthumb, pfread, pfurl, pffile, pfposition, tagname FROM portfolio
